message: This is my first offer, Bob.  I think it's fair considering the inflation disadvantage I face. Let's get this over with!
I think this is a more reasonable split, considering the inflation rate. Your offer was too generous.
Okay, Bob, I've lowered my offer, but this is my final one.  Let's split it before the inflation eats away at my share even more.
I'm not going to give you the majority of the money, Alice. You'll have to do better than that.
